Chinese Premier Li Qiang to visit New Zealand this week, PM Christopher Luxon speaks at post-Cabinet press conference https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-set-to-speak-to-media-at-post-cabinet-press-conference/KJTQLOQVPNFHZEZVNRYSR3CX2M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-set-to-speak-to-media-at-post-cabinet-press-conference/KJTQLOQVPNFHZEZVNRYSR3CX2M/ Julia GabelLuxon will also travel to Tokyo to meet Japan’s Prime Minister Kishida Fumio. Christchurch cancer diagnosis file mix-up: Woman plans own funeral, tells sons she is dying https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-cancer-diagnosis-file-mix-up-woman-plans-own-funeral-tells-sons-she-is-dying/ZTA2RVTTFNCSTJSXNDSTEM57VQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-cancer-diagnosis-file-mix-up-woman-plans-own-funeral-tells-sons-she-is-dying/ZTA2RVTTFNCSTJSXNDSTEM57VQ/ Ben TomsettShe broke the heartbreaking news to her two sons and was considering an assisted death. Mon, 10 Jun 2024 01:46:20 +0000 Christchurch woman Toni Shields and her son. Sheilds spent six days believing she had cancer due to a medical file mix-up. Photo / Supplied

Northland DHB: Missed cancer diagnosis leads to woman’s death after systemic failures https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-dhb-missed-cancer-diagnosis-leads-to-womans-death-after-to-systemic-failures/BUA6APLN5JEUFASW7FMVEQ2AFI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-dhb-missed-cancer-diagnosis-leads-to-womans-death-after-to-systemic-failures/BUA6APLN5JEUFASW7FMVEQ2AFI/ Shannon PitmanThe post-menopausal woman had been bleeding on and off for five years. Mon, 10 Jun 2024 02:05:43 +0000 The woman had five referrals to the Whangārei gynecology unit which all missed the cancer. Photo / NZME
Small business: Kokodak - the fried chicken chain bringing a taste of Korea to Kiwis https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/small-business-kokodak-the-fried-chicken-chain-bringing-a-taste-of-korea-to-kiwis/DKAE5EQZ75H3FBMDCTW5YI7ZAA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/small-business-kokodak-the-fried-chicken-chain-bringing-a-taste-of-korea-to-kiwis/DKAE5EQZ75H3FBMDCTW5YI7ZAA/ John Song hopes to bring the enjoyment of Korean-style chicken to more Kiwis in future. Oranga Tamariki, police continue investigation into ‘violent’ death of Te Kūiti baby https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/te-kuiti-mayor-calls-death-of-baby-a-tragedy-police-continue-investigation-into-violent-assault/G6XVS5VVO5ECNGPIFD2KTQCAFU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/te-kuiti-mayor-calls-death-of-baby-a-tragedy-police-continue-investigation-into-violent-assault/G6XVS5VVO5ECNGPIFD2KTQCAFU/ Rachel Maher, Maryana Garcia'Nobody in the community likes to think that this sort of thing can happen'.
